title: How to Fight a Cold
description: A young boy with a COLD stays home to rest and feel better when he suddenly gets sucked into a strange world where he is coached by a "freshly picked" trainer named Boogie, who then teaches him how to fight a tough COLD. Will Boogie's training be enough for our hero to defeat the big and mighty COLD? With determination, good instruction and a spoonful of luck, our hero may just have a chance.
author: Adam T. Newman
